alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:46PM CDT until July 01 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northeastern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 246 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Bridgeport to near Stevenson to near Henagar, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Henagar, Stevenson, Ider, Bass, Rosalie, Russell Cave National Monument, Long Island, Fabius and Higdon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
